original: @129b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @129b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas padma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas padma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One, Padma-netra.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sarva­nīvaraṇa­viṣkambhin.

original: tadya th'a / aom ta ra ta ra /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom ta ra ta ra /
translated: Tadyathā: Oṃ tara tara

original: ti ri ti ri /
analyzed: ti ri ti ri /

analyzed: tu ru tu ru / ka la ka la /

analyzed: bhi ri bhi ri /

original: bhu ru bhu ru /
analyzed: bhu ru bhu ru /
translated: Bhūrurbhūruru

original: bha ya bha ya /
analyzed: bha ya bha ya /
translated: Bhaya bhaya

original: ku ru ku ru /
analyzed: ku ru ku ru /
translated: Kurukuru

original: sarba karma a'a ba ra na dza ni me sha pra bha ya sv'ah'a /
analyzed: sarba karma a'a ba ra na dza ni me sha pra bha ya sv'ah'a /
translated: Sarva-karma-āvaraṇa-jñāna-meṣa-prabhāya svāhā

original: dzva la ne bi dha ni bee sv'ah'a /
analyzed: dzva la ne bi dha ni bee sv'ah'a /
translated: Jvalane vidha-ne vai svāhā

original: ku ru panytsa li sv'ah'a /
analyzed: ku ru panytsa li sv'ah'a /
translated: Kurupāñcika svāhā

original: s'a ga ra sam bi re sv'ah'a /
analyzed: s'a ga ra sam bi re sv'ah'a /
translated: Sāgara-saṃbire svāhā

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhishthi te sv'ah'a /
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhishthi te sv'ah'a /
translated: Sarva-tathāgata-adhitiṣṭhite svāhā

original: gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te /
translated: The ritual of this dhāraṇī is as follows:

original: nang par langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig lon pa'i tshe las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: nang par langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig lon pa'i tshe las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro /
translated: If one gets up in the morning and recites it one hundred and eight times, then after twenty-one days all karmic obscurations will be exhausted.

original: spyan lnga'ang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyan lnga'ang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will attain the five eyes.

original: de la mig nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la mig nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One will not develop eye diseases.

original: lus la nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus la nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One will not develop physical illnesses.

original: yid kyi nyes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽spyan nga'ang rnam @130a *//
analyzed: yid kyi nyes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // spyan nga'ang rnam @130a *//
translated: One will not develop mental afflictions.

original: par dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: par dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will attain the five eyes.

original: de la mig nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la mig nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One will not develop eye diseases.

original: lus la nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus la nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One will not develop physical illnesses.

original: yid kyi nyes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid kyi nyes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One will not develop mental afflictions.

original: spyan lnga'ang rnam par dag par 'gyur /
analyzed: spyan lnga'ang rnam par dag par 'gyur /
translated: One will attain the five eyes.

original: de bzhin du yid rnam par dag pa lnga'ang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du yid rnam par dag pa lnga'ang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will attain the five pure mental faculties.

original: tshe rabs thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur /
analyzed: tshe rabs thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur /
translated: In all one’s lives one will encounter the appearance of buddhas.

original: byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Until they reach the seat of awakening, they will never be separated from seeing the Buddha, hearing the Dharma, serving the Saṅgha, and bringing all sentient beings to full maturity.

original: lus mdzes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus mdzes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Their bodies will be beautiful.

original: sems dvang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems dvang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Their minds will be clear.

original: 'phags pa padma'i spyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa padma'i spyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The Dhāraṇī of Noble Padma’s Eyes is complete.
